channel.title: 2025 on courtside nyc
channel.description: Recent content in 2025 on courtside nyc

item.title: adda
item.description: menu highlights butter chicken experience get the chaat, skip the pickles

item.title: tamil crown
item.description: thoughts will be back and that says a lot menu highlights beef masala uttapam

item.title: bull & last
item.description: thoughts walk it off in the heath menu highlights bangin sunday roast

item.title: laliko
item.description: thoughts good not great menu highlights imeruli with mint

item.title: armitage alehouse
item.description: thoughts so cozy i wanted to die waiter both nice and sarcastic - the perfect combination. hope he is well menu highlights pot pie sticky date cake (i cried)

item.title: brasero
item.description: thoughts waiter was for sure high, but that added to the experience menu highlights pão de queijo fried chicken

item.title: alla vita
item.description: thoughts delicious menu highlights chicken parm ricotta dumplings

item.title: mr. capri
item.description: thoughts wanted so badly to hate it, but it was actually pretty good “by owner” images on google maps say it all menu highlights paccheri all’arrabiata cotoletta e parmigiana

item.title: the york
item.description: thoughts low-key bar with a good burger

item.title: emilio's ballato
item.description: thoughts stand in line outside and wait for a table - we got there at 5 and were seated around 5:45 you feel like you’re inconvenciencing the staff by breathing air, part of the charm i’ll know i’ve made it when they seat me in the back room walls covered in photos w/ celebs, absolutely timeless decor menu highlights arrabiata chicken parm alla vodka

item.title: rubirosa
item.description: menu highlights low-key the caesar salad was bangin pizza w/ vodka sauce & pesto drizzle italian mini donuts

item.title: din thai fung
item.description: thoughts operates with the efficiency of small hotel menu highlights pork xiao long bao string beans

item.title: fairfax
item.description: thoughts sit & yap menu highlights burger gnocchi

item.title: golden unicorn
item.description: thoughts florescent lights so bright it’s giving vegas casino idk what kind of optical illusion they’re running over there, but when you’re sitting down, everyone standing looks 7ft tall menu highlights dim sum

item.title: nerina
item.description: thoughts wine list is amazing menu highlights zucchini chips lemon potato gnocchi

item.title: nowon
item.description: thoughts should come with epilepsy warning menu highlights chopped cheese rice cakes burger

item.title: nura
item.description: thoughts refreshingly high ceilings menu highlights japanese sweet potato crudo

item.title: tabare
item.description: thoughts sleeper hit menu highlights empanadas churrasco

item.title: san sabino
item.description: thoughts excellent menu highlights spicy tuna manicottini gelato

item.title: laut
item.description: thoughts a lot happening in there could have been a fever dream, who’s to say menu highlights nasi lemak crying tiger beef

item.title: chito grivito
item.description: thoughts best georgian i’ve had in the city menu highlights don’t sleep on the salads megrelian khachapuri

item.title: crevette
item.description: thoughts that corner is cursed, not sure it will last menu highlights lemon dessert was unreal

item.title: maison premiere
item.description: menu highlights oysters

item.title: sinsa
item.description: menu highlights donkatsu au poivre

item.title: moody tongue

item.title: kiko

item.title: ceremonia bakeshop

item.title: ambra
item.description: thoughts classic west village, but wants to be club-staurant hurt my soul, but had to ask them to turn the music down

item.title: ho foods

item.title: eavesdrop
